title: Please nerf Darius
body: Riot always preaches they want to balance the game and balance the laning phases of champions like Yasuo but Riot you consistently over look the BIGGEST LANE BULLY IN GAME  DARIUS WHO SERIOUSLY NEEDS TO BE NERFED  . Darius basically has no counter play as his whole kit which allows him to consistently life steal and sustain in lane. In addition he deals a shit ton of damage by just building tank come on, you got rid of tank Ekko due to the insane damage and subtain he offers. But you over look Darius who basically does the same thing. PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF GOD NERF DARIUS I AM SO SICK OF HIM and his overly dominant laning and late game.

replies.body: Play Jayce, Kennen, Vlad, Swain, or Tryndamere/Trundle and rush executioners calling. Darius is one of the most Kiteable champions in the game, just learn his weaknesses and stop complaining.

Pretty much this

Although you are correct with your information about darius, I still disagree about him being "broken". I have mained him for nearly 3 years now, and I'm not just outright defending him, because I am constantly matched against darius myself, and because I know his weaknesses and what champs to pick against him, rarely have I ever actually had trouble fighting him. If you follow what I suggested and picked ranged champions like kennen or jayce, you can outpoke him in lane, deny him cs, and just harass the hell out of him. 

Even if you don't like either of those champs, you can play tryn or trundle, rush executioners to stop him from healing, and just ultimately out-damaged him. PLUS even better both tryn and trundles ultimate abilities actually totally screw over darius and his ultimate. I can't tell you the amount of times I've attempted to dunk a tryn or trundle and suddenly tryn is undying and trundle is rapidly gaining back his health and well as extra defences.

EVEN BETTER STILL I can play Fiora against him and dash into him everytime he Q's to prevent him from healing and gaining  a stack as well as rushing lifesteal to overpower him in fights. A big thing that counters darius is LIFESTEAL, because if he can't get you low enough, HE SIMPLY CAN'T DUNK YOU. Rush in as fiora, ult him, and by the time he's gotten 5 stacks off he's either already dead (Because fiora's vitals are fuking nuts) or  you've triggered your ultimate healing and you already have your entire health back.

I can keep going on longer if anyone still wants to tell me that darius can't be dealt with, I may be low elo, I may be bad at some elements of the game, but I'll tell you now, I KNOW DARIUS

It's all very well to play Kennen or Jayce, but neither of them actually contribute needed stats to the team.

At my elo, no one picks tanks, so whenever I play top, I am forced to pick a tank so that we can have at least 1.
I'd love to be able to play Fiora, but if I don't pick Shen or Yorick. The tankiest one on the team will be Fiora... and that'll be a very short game indeed.

And seeming Darius is as tanky as most tanks, but does more damage, battles between him and tanks don't end well for the tanks.

The thing is, Darius doesn't have to wait for you to be low to dunk you, it's just a 'feel good'. In a 1v1 where you don't need resets to continue the fight. You can just ult them as soon as you get 5 stacks. BAM they are now extremely low, and in their panic to get away, they are easy pickings. Unlike Garen or other execute ults, you don't lose damage if you ult too early. So it's not a huge loss if you do.

Im not saying that he is the stupidest champ in the game or anything.
He just does too much damage for how survivable he is. _(and he isnt the only one)_

Part of my problem is that I'm a mid laner, and mages vs bruisers is a matchup destined to fail. So most of the time I encounter a Darius, he is too tanky for me to burst, and has too much damage/cc for me to live long enough to match his output.

But I can appreciate that you know Darius inside and out! So I'm not dismissing what you have said. Everyone finds it easier to fight their own champions.
